rule_name: Database queries should not be vulnerable to injection attacks
issue_description: Make sure that string concatenation is not used to build SQL queries.

rule_name: Endpoints should not be vulnerable to reflected cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks
issue_description: Make sure this reflected cross-site scripting is safe here.

rule_name: OS commands should not be vulnerable to injection attacks
issue_description: Make sure that executing this OS command is safe here.
